annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 国家支持创新网络安全管理方式，运用网络新技术，提升网络安全保护水平。
annotations.translation: The government supports the development of innovative cybersecurity management methods and the use of new network technologies to improve the level of cybersecurity protection.

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 大众传播媒介应当有针对性地面向社会进行网络安全宣传教育。
annotations.translation: The mass media shall provide pertinent cybersecurity publicity and education to the public.

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 网络产品、服务的提供者应当为其产品、服务持续提供安全维护；在规定或者当事人约定的期限内，不得终止提供安全维护。
annotations.translation: Providers of network products or services shall continuously provide security maintenance for their products or services; they may not terminate the provision of security maintenance within the prescribed time period specified or agreed upon by the parties.

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 网络产品、服务具有收集用户信息功能的，其提供者应当向用户明示并取得同意；涉及用户个人信息的，还应当遵守本法和有关法律、行政法规关于个人信息保护的规定。
annotations.translation: If the network products and services have the function of collecting user information, the provider shall express and obtain consent from the user; if the user's personal information is involved, it shall also comply with the provisions of this Law and relevant laws and administrative regulations on the protection of personal information.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第十九条 各级人民政府及其有关部门应当组织开展经常性的网络安全宣传教育， 并指导、督促有关单位做好网络安全宣传教育工作。
annotations.translation: Article 19: People's governments at all levels and their relevant departments shall organize and conduct regular cybersecurity publicity and education, and instruct and urge relevant entities to effectively conduct cybersecurity publicity and education.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第二十条 国家支持企业和高等学校、职业学校等教育培训机构开展网络安全相关教育与培训，采取多种方式培养网络安全人才，促进网络安全人才交流。
annotations.translation: Article 20: The government supports enterprises and schools of higher learning, vocational schools, and other education and training institutions in providing education and training related to cybersecurity, employing multiple methods to cultivate cybersecurity professionals, and promoting the exchange of cybersecurity professionals.

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: 第三章 网络运行安全

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第二十一条 国家实行网络安全等级保护制度。网络运营者应当按照网络安全等级保护制度的要求，履行下列安全保护义务，保障网络免受干扰、破坏或者未经授权的访问，防止网络数据泄露或者被窃取、篡改：
annotations.translation: Article 21: The government implements a cybersecurity tiered protection system. Network operators shall fulfill the following security protection obligations in accordance with the requirements of the cybersecurity tiered protection system to safeguard the network against interference, harm, or unauthorized access, and prevent the leakage, theft, or alteration of network data:

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （一）制定内部安全管理制度和操作规程，确定网络安全负责人，落实网络安全保护责任；
annotations.translation: (1) Develop internal security management systems and operating procedures, appointing a person responsible for cybersecurity to ensure accountability to cybersecurity protection;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （二）采取防范计算机病毒和网络攻击、网络侵入等危害网络安全行为的技术措施；
annotations.translation: (2) Take technical precautions to avoid computer viruses, network attacks, network intrusions, and other threats to cybersecurity;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （三）采取监测、记录网络运行状态、网络安全事件的技术措施，并按照规定留存相关的网络日志不少于六个月；
annotations.translation: (3) Take technical measures to monitor and record network operation status and cybersecurity events, and keep relevant network logs for not less than six months in accordance with regulations;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （四）采取数据分类、重要数据备份和加密等措施；
annotations.translation: (4) Employ measures such as data classification, as well as backup and encryption of important data;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （五）法律、行政法规规定的其他义务。
annotations.translation: (5) Other obligations stipulated by laws and administrative regulations.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第二十二条 网络产品、服务应当符合相关国家标准的强制性要求。网络产品、服务的提供者不得设置恶意程序；发现其网络产品、服务存在安全缺陷、漏洞等风险时，应当立即采取补救措施，按照规定及时告知用户并向有关主管部门报告。
annotations.translation: Article 22: Network products and services shall comply with the mandatory requirements of relevant national standards. Providers of network products and services are not permitted to install malicious programs; when they discover risks such as security defects and loopholes in their network products and services, they should immediately take remedial measures, notify users in a timely manner according to regulations, and report to the relevant competent authorities.
